description: Ambrella has developed several spin-off games in the Pokémon series. Some of these games store assets and other data in PKC files.

PKC files contain many different types of game data. For example, in Pokémon Channel, some PKC files contain the game's title screen and cutscenes. In Pokémon Rumble, a PKC file contains a list of passwords used to unlock Pokémon. Other PKC files contain other types of game data.
